text: Charles Otto Puth Jr. (; born December 2, 1991) is an American singer- songwriter and record producer. His song "See You Again" was released as Puth's debut single in 2015. His debut single "Marvin Gaye", which featured vocals from Meghan Trainor. The song topped charts in New Zealand, Ireland, and the United Kingdom. In 2017, he released two songs, "Attention" and "How Long" from his second studio album, Voicenotes, with the former peaking at number five on Billboard Hot 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:American contemporary R&B; singers Category:American R&B; singers Category:American pop singers Category:American soul singers Category:American blue-eyed soul singers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American doo-wop singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American record producers Category:American pianists Category:Singers from New Jersey Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:Atlantic Records artists
title: Charlie Puth
